resources.string:
How do you quit apps?
Tapping Back always means that you want to quit.
Tapping Home or Overview will put apps into background.

Brevent recognizes states of apps in this way, preventing apps in Brevent list from running in long time.

When you tap Back to quit apps, apps and bound services won\'t run anymore; tap Home or Overview, or just put apps into background, apps and bound services will keep running; swipe apps away from recents screen, apps will be force-stopped. Whenever apps are ran without activity, Brevent will force-stop them.\n\nApps in Brevent list can be set \"allow sync\" to receive notifications or execute jobs and syncs. Brevent won\'t standby \"allow sync\" apps, and Brevent won\'t force-stop \"allow sync\" apps with notifications or running in background.
What do you need to do? \nJust a simple command via ADB with your PC.
Brevent won\'t work if Android-powered device reboots. Since Android 8, Brevent won\'t work if you turn off \"USB Debugging\" or change USB options.
Brevent does not need root access nor the ability to modify system files, there is no residue after uninstallation.

Brevent uses plenty of Android\'s hidden APIs. Some third-party ROMs may modify these APIs, so there would be some issues when using.\n\nDO NOT use Brevent on work devices, NOR BREVENT work apps, frequently used apps, or important apps.
Enjoy Brevent, and if you find any issues, please feel free to send feedback with logs.

The default Brevent method is \"Standby, then force-stop\". Standby (since Android 6.0, unsupported on some devices) apps can\'t access network, nor execute jobs or syncs.\n\nBrevent won\'t force-stop safe cached apps. In addition, Brevent server brevents apps centrally and delays the processes by 3 to 60 seconds, according to the event level.

ADB (Android Debug Bridge) is a command-line tool that lets a PC communicate with an Android device. It\'s part of platform-tools, you can download it from here: https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/platform-tools.html (long-press to select and copy).

1. Uncompress platform-tools-latest-<platform>.zip

2. Navigate to platform-tools directory

3. (for Windows) Hold Shift key, then right-click, choose "Open command window here", then use ".\adb" to replace the hinted "adb" (please remove duplicate "adb" when paste the command line)

3. (for macOS) Navigate "Finder", "Applications", "Utilities", launch "Terminal", drag "adb" into the "Terminal", then use "adb" with full path to replace the hinted "adb" (please remove duplicate "adb" when paste the command line)

4. You need to ADB every time after you turn on your device, please avoid restarting or shutting down your device as much as possible

1. Turn on "Developer options", enable "USB debugging" %1$s

2. Connect to PC via USB %2$s

3. Execute in PC's command line "adb devices", make sure PC can recognize device (Reader "Guide - ADB")

4. Execute in PC's command line "%3$s"
Brevent server started successfully. Please tap app icons to choose, then brevent them
Retrieving process status, just a moment. . .
Starting Brevent server, just a moment. . .
Checking Brevent server, just a moment. . .
Feel free to send feedback.\n\nIf you have a GitHub account, please create an issue; you can view opened issues too.%s
Update Brevent list when apps are installed or uninstalled (not supported on some ROMs)
Standby when you exit apps (tap \"Back\"), or background apps timed out; force-stop when reach standby timeout, or swipe apps away from recents screen\n\nAlways force-stop ran apps without activity
Standby when you exit apps (tap \"Back\"), or background apps timed out\n\nAlways force-stop ran apps without activity
Force-stop when you exit apps (tap \"Back\"), or background apps timed out, or swipe apps away from recents screen\n\nAlways force-stop ran apps without activity
Background apps will be brevented after %s\n\nBrevent shows inactive time for background apps dynamically
Force-stop when apps have standby for %1$s\n\nBrevent doesn\'t show standby time
All apps have the same signature with framework\n\nBe careful when breventing core apps
WTF, all apps are framework apps
Including system and core apps which cannot be launched nor upgraded\n\nBe careful when breventing system and core apps which cannot be launched
Check Brevent server every 15 minutes\n\nTurn on if Brevent stops unreasonably
Brevent immediately when apps return to home via non Home(such as Back)
Won\'t be brevented while playing with notification, won\'t be force-stopped while pausing with notification
If app is ran with notifications as service, set it to aggressive.
Android OS apps cannot be brevented
Thanks for paying %s Brefoil via Play Store
Thanks for priceless contribution on Brevent
Thanks for paying %1$s Brefoil via Play Store, %2$s Brefoil via non Play Store
Thanks for paying %s Brefoil via Play Store, and priceless contribution on Brevent
Thanks for paying %s Brefoil, and priceless contribution on Brevent
Thanks for paying %1$s Brefoil via Play Store, %2$s Brefoil via non Play Store, and priceless contribution on Brevent
Be careful, may cause apps crash
Disabled apps must be enabled to use
Enable and disable brevented GMS dynamically
Brevent is only available for Owner.
Brevent is unavailable in App clone.
No permission to access Brevent server.\n\nTop apps: %1$s.
No event log, Brevent server cannot work automatically.\n\nPlease try later, or contact ROM provider.
No event log since %1$s, Brevent server cannot work automatically.\n\nPlease restart Brevent server or contact ROM provider.
Brevent server is upgrading. Please try again later.
Cannot get logs. Please try again later.
Brevent can\'t access local network; please modify your network settings, battery saver, or force doze. Send feedback with logs when necessary, or uninstall directly.
Since Android 8, Brevent server would stop working whenever \"USB Debugging\" turns off.\n\nDon\'t turn off \"USB debugging\", don\'t change USB options.
Brevent server has no sufficient permissions; some features are unavailable.
Brevent diagnosis is unsupported. Please make sure Brevent can run in background, then turn on again.
Invalid location for Brevent; please reinstall.
You have brevented important apps: %1$s.\n\nDo you want to unbrevent them?
Apps are allowed to receive messages via sync, broadcast, and FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging).
Apps are allowed to receive messages via sync or broadcast.
Apps are prohibited to run. Normally, brevented apps can run for several seconds so Brevent can check to see if it is safe or not.
Apps won\'t be set as aggressive automatically.
App is disabled. You must enable before using it.
App is running temporarily; it will be disabled later.
App is connected to a VPN. Brevent won\'t force-stop connected VPN.
App is playing. Brevent won\'t force-stop playing apps.
App is paused. Brevent won\'t force-stop paused apps with notifications.
Apps are regarded as important by your ROM.
Safe apps. You shouldn\'t regard it as running.
Apps are on standby; they will be force-stopped when it reaches standby timeout.
Apps are running and waiting to be brevented.
Thanks for paying total %1$s Brefoil via Alipay
Thanks for paying %1$s Brefoil via Alipay
Tap \"Records\" to confirm payment if you have paid
Can\'t confirm payment, please don\'t pay
Tap here to send feedback, and give a detailed description
You have brevented %1$d apps. Please consider paying %2$s to make Brevent better.
Exec command only supports simple shell script, use it at your own risk.
Enable and disable apps via Brevent server
